Greetings to Gambian President 
    Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Feb. 15 sent a message of greetings to Gambian President Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh  on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the independence of Gambia.
 Congratulating the president and people of Gambia on the independence day, the message wished them great success in their work for the national unity and prosperity of the country.
